title: Cinefantastique Vol 32 No 2 (August 2000)
creator: Cinefantastique
description: Stories include the first X-Men movie, What Lies Beneath, Hannibal, The Cell, Chicken Run, Hollow Man, Imposter, The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle, For the Cause, Dragonheart: A New Beginning, Titan A.E., Godzilla 2000, and the unfinished film The Primevals.
